basics.name: Alexander Widing
basics.label: Tech Chief / Lead Software Engineer
basics.summary:
Engineering leader with over 11 years of full-stack development experience, specializing in PHP/Laravel ecosystems and Python development. Currently serving as Tech Chief at a SaaS startup, with recent focus on Python-driven AI automation development and system integrations, leading product development and AI engineering initiatives.

Proven track record spanning agency work delivering e-commerce systems, corporate websites, and comprehensive tech solutions including DevOps implementations for enterprise clients. Developed robust internal systems spanning ERP, HRM, accounting, and CRM platforms to optimize operational efficiency. Combines deep technical expertise with progressive team leadership, having advanced from Engineer to Senior Engineer to Lead Engineer to executive technical roles.
